snippet: Melody Stein tells how she and her husband, both deaf, started Mozzeria, a pizza restaurant in San Francisco.
abstract: Preoccupations column features Melody Stein describing how she and her husband, both deaf, started Mozzeria pizza restaurant in San Francisco.

headline.print_headline: Deaf, Determined And Sold on Mozzarella
